description: Alaska Fairbanks’ cocktail recipes are a great way to start your next&nbsp;party off right. This cocktail recipe is the signature drink at the University of Alaska Fairbanks and has been popular in the state for years.
name: Duck Fart

recipeInstructions.name: Carefully using the back of a bar spoon, layer the ingredients into a shot glass in the following order: coffee liqueur, Irish cream and whiskey.
recipeInstructions.text: Carefully using the back of a bar spoon, layer the ingredients into a shot glass in the following order: coffee liqueur, Irish cream and whiskey.
